tf_idf

类 ReadExtract

  • java.lang.Object
    • tf_idf.ReadExtract

  • public class ReadExtract
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: this is TF-IDF Algorithm

    Description:云创大数据广移广告PK大赛前期数据挖据算法准备

    Company:cstor

    Reference:http://www.cnblogs.com/ywl925/archive/2013/08/26/3275878.html

    作者:
    zhuxy 2016年7月19日 上午10:26:01

    • 方法详细资料

      • readDirs

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readDirs(java.lang.String filepath)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        get list of file for the directory, including sub-directory of it
        参数:
        filepath - 文件的输入路径
        返回:
        the all files absolute path under the dictionary of filepath
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - 没找到文件异常
        java.io.IOException - IO异常

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(java.lang.String file)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        for each absolute path of file, the method read the file content, and then return the file content int the style of string
        参数:
        file - 输入文件路径
        返回:
        the file content of file absolute path
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - 没找到文件异常
        java.io.IOException - IO异常

      • cutWords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cutWords(java.lang.String file)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        word segmentation: to split the file content to each word
        参数:
        file - 文件
        返回:
        the words set in one file
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO异常

      • normalTF

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> normalTF(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cutwords)
        term frequency in a file, times for each word
        参数:
        cutwords - 分词数组
        返回:
        key-word; value-times

      • tf

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> tf(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cutwords)
        Relative Word Frequency: term frequency in a file, frequency of each word
        参数:
        cutwords - 读取文件内容分词的动态数组
        返回:
        this is relative word frequency-the real TF

      • normalTFAllFiles

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> normalTFAllFiles(java.lang.String dirc)
                                                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        tf times for file
        参数:
        dirc - 目录
        返回:
        key-file; value-the pair of key(word) and value(normTF);
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO异常

      • tfAllFiles

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float>> tfAllFiles(java.lang.String dirc)
                                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        tf for all file
        参数:
        dirc - 目录
        返回:
        allTF TF计算结果
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO异常

      • idf

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> idf(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float>> all_tf)
        the idf calculate
        参数:
        all_tf - HashMap类型，所有的TF度量值
        返回:
        返回IDF的计算结果

      • tf_idf

        public static void tf_idf(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float>> all_tf,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> idfs)
        the tf-idf calculate
        参数:
        all_tf - 所有的TF计算值
        idfs - 所有的IDF的计算值

      • DisTfIdf

        public static void DisTfIdf(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float>> tfidf)
        only output the info to control, and other do nothing
        参数:
        tfidf - 输入为TF_IDF计算结果；用于本方法（输出）的输入
